prop.caption: type
prop.description: the spatial distribution of the icons within the image.

prop.caption: size
prop.description: the width and height in pixels of an icon. Use this for square icons.

prop.caption: width
prop.description: the width of an icon in pixels.

prop.caption: height
prop.description: the height of an icon in pixels.

prop.caption: offset
prop.description: the distance from the calculated grid point that has to be added. This value consists of two numbers seperated by a comma. Defaults to 0,0.
